title: The People Behind Brickcraft
description: A lot of people have come together to make Brickcraft what it is today, from directly working on the pack, to providing support and feedback. Here are some of the key contributors:

contributors.name: AlexTestria
contributors.description: The original owner and creator of Brickcraft, who laid the foundation for the pack and its vision.

contributors.name: AleinaTestria
contributors.description: The current owner of Brickcraft, continuing the legacy of AlexTestria and ensuring the pack continues to evolve and improve.

contributors.name: Inferno31415
contributors.description: A long-time pack maintainer and creator of many of the mobs and models found in Brickcraft.

contributors.name: Mr.AAA
contributors.description: The current lead creator of Brickcraft, who has been working on the pack since 2025.

contributors.name: Blockerlocker
contributors.description: Creator of the iconic brick sounds for clicking buttons, stepping on blocks, taking damage, and more.

contributors.name: HumorlessHank
contributors.description: Creator of many of the passive mobs.

contributors.name: FabulousFox
contributors.description: Created the stud versions of the Minecraft paintings.

contributors.name: Nolram
contributors.description: Community moderator and supporter, helping maintain the Brickcraft community and providing ongoing support to users.

contributors.name: Bane
contributors.description: Developer of this website and related tools.
